title: Update TestSolrCloudWithKerberosAlt to work with Hadoop 3 Minikdc
description: The Minikdc provided by Hadoop 3 is using Apache Kerby library for kerberos authentication (instead of ApacheDS library used in 2.x versions). This jira is to track the changes required to get the TestSolrCloudWithKerberosAlt to pass with the Minikdc shipped as part of Hadoop 3.
